name: Corporal BetsyÂ¹

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: {PC is female, CHA 7+}Girl... you are some grade-A poon, anybody ever tell you that?{brazen come-on}

topics.topic_text: I heard you were raped by Cook-cook.
topics.response_text: Can't stop talking about that, can they? The Lieutenant actually sat me down and asked if I wanted to talk to a doctor.{talking about her rape - trying to shrug it off}

topics.topic_text: Don't you want some payback?
topics.response_text: What kind of dumbass question is that? Of course I want payback.

topics.topic_text: 10 of Spades blames himself.
topics.response_text: Yeah. Typical. Thing is, that fat pile of shit sneaked up on us from behind and kicked little 10 in the back of the head.{Typical references her male partner, who blames himself for her rape - spoken as "typical guy"}

topics.topic_text: You were raped. That's not something you can just shrug off.
topics.response_text: Never said it was. But I don't need to talk to any doctors. Especially not the pricks around here.

topics.topic_text: I thought you should know. Cook-cook is dead.
topics.response_text: You killed him? Well, shit. Here I'd dreamed up this whole elaborate revenge fantasy.{only half joking}

topics.topic_text: You're a sniper?
topics.response_text: What gave me away? The big gun, the shades, or the attitude?{deadpan sarcastic}

topics.topic_text: The big gun.
topics.response_text: Don't take this the wrong way, but girl, it's a damn good thing you're hot. That sarcasm blew right over your head, didn't it?

topics.topic_text: I didn't know that all snipers wear shades.
topics.response_text: They don't. Only the good ones do.

topics.topic_text: Who's your partner?
topics.response_text: The little guy. 10 of Spades. I like him because he listens. Doesn't shut up the rest of the time, but when I talk, he listens.

topics.topic_text: So snipers work in pairs?
topics.response_text: {Female PC, CHA 7+}Yeah. We spot for each other, watch each other's backs. Usually works pretty well, unless you get paired up with an asshole.

topics.topic_text: Actually, I didn't notice the attitude until just now.
topics.response_text: Hah! See, we've even got the same sense of humor. I like a girl who doesn't piss me off after sex.{another brash come-on to female player}

topics.topic_text: How about a date? I like tough women.
topics.response_text: {lesbian, hostile}Yeah, right. You're sniffing up the wrong skirt. Try me again when you're tall, blonde, and female.{player just made a pass at her}

topics.topic_text: Have you seen any serious combat here?
topics.response_text: Not unless you count the Fiends as serious. Gorobets keeps us inside the fence, most of the time. Doesn't matter to me, I just shoot bad guys.

topics.topic_text: What do you mean?
topics.response_text: Legion fights to win. And they're smart... hell of a lot smarter than these crazy Fiends. But I don't feel bad about shooting Legion boys.

topics.topic_text: First I've heard about conscience in a while.
topics.response_text: Some cute little junkie bitch, so fucked-up she doesn't even know that she's the bad guy. And I've got to headshot her. Makes me think.

topics.topic_text: I've killed so many people, I don't even think about it.
topics.response_text: Yeah, well, we can't all be heartless shitheads, right?

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Yeah... I always scare off the hot ones...{hot ones = hot women that she likes}

topics.topic_text: That's a little forward, don't you think?
topics.response_text: Yeah. So what? I could take a bullet in the skull tomorrow. I haven't got time to take it slow and subtle.{player just said she was being too forward}

topics.topic_text: Sorry, not interested.
topics.response_text: Damn shame. I've got some leave time coming to me, and I booked a suite at the Gomorrah. The two of us, rolled up in those silk sheets...

topics.topic_text: {Cherchez-la-Femme}Only all the time.
topics.response_text: You and me at Gomorrah, rolled up in those silk sheets. I got leave coming up in a bit, so let me know if you'll be around.

topics.topic_text: You should get medical help for your trauma.
topics.response_text: The Lieutenant's been talking to you, hasn't he? Look, I don't need a head doctor - I'm First Recon, damn it.

topics.topic_text: Mental trauma can slow you down or distract you, but it's treatable - just like any bullet wound.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Just another injury to take care of, huh? Well, when you put it that way... all right. You can tell the Lieutenant I finally caved.

topics.topic_text: The rest of First Recon all agree that you should go see Doctor Usanagi.
topics.response_text: This was none of their business - or yours. You've got no right to talk to people behind my back about this.

topics.topic_text: 10 of Spades says his stuttering got better because of Usanagi.
topics.response_text: {snorting, sarcastic}He got better? If he says so. Anyway, 10 of Spades is a good kid - maybe I ought to listen to him for once.

topics.topic_text: Bitter-Root admitted that Usanagi was able to help him with his problems.
topics.response_text: Bitter-Root actually said that? I can't see him talking about his problems to anybody, much less admitting that someone else actually helped him.

topics.topic_text: Sterling said that if he'd let his pride get in the way, he wouldn't be in First Recon.
topics.response_text: I always wondered about that. First Recon is elite, but the rangers... I can't imagine what it'd be like to lose that kind of status.

topics.topic_text: You're a weak link. I know it, you know it, and First Recon knows it. Do something about it.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{impressed by player's harsh attitude}Damn. Never had you pegged for the drill instructor type, but you got my attention.

topics.topic_text: Yes. But never a woman.
topics.response_text: Trust me, the alpha males are overrated. Plenty of them in the army. All they're good for is killing each other and taking smelly shits.

conversation.response_text: Yeah... I always scare off the hot ones...

description:
Corporal Betsy is a 34 year-old Caucasian Female.

A weathered NCR soldier with sharp eyes and an even sharper tongue. Betsy has the look of someone who's spent years in the Mojave sun, with calloused hands and a no-nonsense demeanor that belies her kindhearted nature beneath.

Corporal Betsy's Personality: Outwardly cantankerous and no-nonsense, Betsy is actually a kindhearted professional who takes pride in her work. As an openly lesbian, she's promiscuous and has a preference for beautiful tall blondes. She maintains complete respect for her team members and has a strong sense of justice, even if she simplifies it as 'just shooting the bad guys.'

Corporal Betsy's Backstory: Betsy joined the NCR Army at a young age and worked her way up through the ranks. She eventually volunteered for special assignments with First Recon, where she was partnered with 10 of Spades. During one of their first assignments together, the pair was ambushed by Cook-Cook's gang of Fiends. While 10 of Spades was knocked unconscious, Betsy managed to escape with her life, though the experience left a deep scar. For the past six months, she has been stationed at Camp McCarran with Alpha Team, mostly on perimeter duty and guarding the towers.
